:::The Destrocons/Destructus:::

::They rejoice for a few seconds after the stasis field drops, but then get 
serious::
Ramjet: Remember what we promised ourselves. No Trainer will survive!
::They transform and combine to form Destructus::
Destructus: YOU SHALL ALL BE DESTROYED!
::Destructus fires 2 from each shoulder cannon at Ignatius::

--part1_dc.7ed800a.286093fb_boundary
